results.title: The Calling from The Fountain of Goof (F.O.G.) Tv Network
results.description:
The Fountain of Goof (F.O.G.) Tv Network

Presents:  "The Calling"   Pros/Cons of Robo Calls

Dial Tone...Beep..."Hello?"

Conversation Senarios 
a.  Suicide Prevention Call Center - with Robo Andy Answer...the caller is placed on hold...

b.  Political Advertisements - "Hey Voter...This is Genuine Guy Politician calling to say:  My opponent will Not be a good candidate for the job...so...vote for me...and I will be original -

c.  Emergency Alerts (calls and texts) messages

d.  A Spiritual...Daily...Positive Message of Hope, Encouragement and Love.

e.  A reminder to hug your child(ren) and send them off to school with a gentle morning smile...

f.  Grandma answers the phone and converses with Robo Annie...Annie...R-U-OK?"  Pumping her with endless questions about new, inexpensive medical products...just recite her SSN and credit card number to receive a bonus gift card...for only $99 (of 5 easy monthly payments)

g.  A Happy Birthday jingle...

h.  Visual Robo Call - with a digital picture slide show...soft music...kids/loved ones pictures...along with a positive message...and/or...just a "thank you for all that you do"

i.  A Phone Call w/out Visuals...announcing tests schedules, appointments, reminders...or portions of pre-recorded study notes...as you drive/ride to class to take a final exam.

j.  A variety of jokes on your daily commute...an imagery...eye opening of chuckles...

k.  And...a robo caller calls another robo caller...an endless conversation of confusion...until...Monday morning...when the computer/electronic engineer walks into his prototype test lab to hear them converse in a romantic dialog...

Eggster Monsalve
F.O.G. Tv Network Journalmist

Support Operation Smile

Note: Please use MEMO, an editor writing software, in oder to open this digital file.

results.title: 3 Suggestions on How to Keep a Dream Journal
results.description:
3 Suggestions on How to Keep a Dream Journal

1.  When waking up...reach over very slowly...as though picking up a couple of saltine crackers...from experiencing a bout of morning sickness...trying extremely hard not to toss your cookies...and...pick up a pen and writing tablet - 

Try hard to remember...jot down as much as possible...before the ink runs down...gravitating to the point of not being able to write due to its position...unless now-a-days there are (most likely) higher priced plumes that function at any angle.

2.  Ask yourself...request your subconscious mind to remember your dream(s)...even after a quick visit to the restroom that might divert a few thoughts/ideas.

3.  Be consistent in jotting down thoughts and feelings -
     a.  What was the mood like in the dream?  Did you  feel a sense of happiness?  Sadness?  Anxiousness?  Surprised?

     b.  Who was in your dream?  Family members?  Friends?  Co-workers?

     c.  Did you dream in color or black and white?

     d.  Specifics:  such as - type of clothing...any details that stood out...objects, places, etc..

In my personal opinion, there are no instant cookbook dictionaries that interpret the exact meaning of dreams...but only the dreamer (himself/herself).

Eggster Monsalve

Note: Please use MEMO, an editor writing software, in oder to open this digital file.

results.title: How to Stay True to God’s Kingdom While Living Thru a World of Greed, Control and Behavior of Hatred
results.description:
How to Stay True to God’s Kingdom While Living Thru a World of Greed, Control and Behavior of Hatred

1.	Listen carefully

2.	Observe and question – always

3.	Persistency, Consistency and Respect throughout your journey

4.	Learn when to bite your tongue

5.	Know when to speak up

6.	Walk away from the bait of bad fishermen

7.	Learn how to recognize it first

8.	Be yourself

9.	Breathe – Remember to…

10.	Patience – Gentleness and Kindness goes a long way

11.	Share – Care and Love…even in times of living among an all for one and one for one attitude mind set

12.	 Working for the Kingdom of God is the most difficult job on earth

13.	  And at the same time, to look forward for your “check” – its value will exceed above and beyond your imagination

14.	  Work hard – Learn as much as you can and Pray like hell

15.	  Stay calm, cool and collected

16.	  Focus on focusing

17.	  Keep fond memories in your heart and in your mind thru these trying times – happy memories bring back so much strength, courage and motivation to keep going…and going…

18.	  Art, write and be playful

19.	  Spending time with others (without even saying a word) is healing

20.	  Love is the essence of life – in whatever shape or form

21.	  Take care of yourself first…so…you can take good care of your children

22.	  Children are also a reflection of you – let them change/decide and freely travel their own path in life…no matter how difficult it may be for both

23.	  Learn from others mistakes/deeds as well as your own – and – if so desired – remedy it in a kind, gentle way without violence, harsh words and/or retaliation…The “Let go and let God” effect

24.	  Using drugs/alcohol = a temporary instant gratification...to me = a too easy and a not worth wild solution

25.	  Don’t let the bull get you = Don’t let others define who you are

26.	  The price of freedom is not always free

27.	  If you’ve ever hit emotional rock bottom…get back up…brush off the dust and climb your way back up – there is always light at the top of the stairs

28.	  Quiet your mind…by being quiet, still and patient

29.	  Humor is another tool for healing oneself as well as others…but keep in mind…the choice of words we use (speak/write) can heal or hurt in this world of personal interpretations…resulting in the court of public opinion

30.	  Though the sun will come up tomorrow – let its warm light inside your heart right now…just crank open the sunroof in your mind

31.	  Stupidity is in the eyes of the beholder

32.	  Age is in the mind of the older –

33.	  Is it…Out of sight, out of mind or does absence truly makes the heart grow fonder (?)

34.	  Listening to verbal nonsense (from adults) can drain many into a sinking pipeline of time wasted

35.	  In my opinion…there is not always a cookbook recipe for anything…so…rather than follow the yellow brick road like everyone else…gather a lot of tools and build your own (road)

36.	  It’s not the thought that counts…it’s the reaction(s) you hand them back will be the true gift

37.	  Advice:  Work just in changing yourself and leave trying to change the world – the world is changing all on its own

38.	  God can defend himself – I pretty much guess he wants you to take good care of yourself so you can care and help/heal others in need

39.	  In times of doubt…listen to your own inner-voice/intuition and then decide what to do or say

40.	  I’ve learned that giggling/laughter is very, very contagious…but…these days…it’s not always the “When you’re smiling…When your laughing…The whole world smiles with you" kind of old (1960’s) tune.

Esther Monsalve
The Angel Shop

Note: Please use MEMO, an editor writing software, in oder to open this digital file.

results.title: Eggster's List July 2017 (2)
results.description:
Eggster's List July 2017 (2)

1.	 A Vulture's Rude Awakening – a short story on how God protects and takes care of those who are constantly taunted and annoyed by false, earlybird callers – to unexpectedly discover these (false birds) trying to sleep, then awakened each morning outside, lying uncomfortably on the back of a nearby pickup truck.

2.	Out of the Mouth of Rage - on how mother nature naturally disciplines her wilderness campers, flooding their anger/violence with an earth shaking and rude jolt.

3.	CleanNix – a roommate who blows off their share of house chores.

4.	Que-Tips – a rehearsal for news reporters on how to improve reading a teleprompter.

5.	Mama's Boy Soo-Dah – a mother-in-law's diet drink for her son's own safety and protection.

6.	The Big “D”- current leader of our country from Tasmania

7.	A blow job – a lawn maintenance employee whose task is using a gas leaf blower.

8.	Poison Control Hot line – 1-800-Toss-Ur-Cookies

9.	DeOrderRant – a social media bully/troll who needs to clean up his stinky, unwanted opinions and smack downs.

10.	Funnel Cloud – a new type of computer network hacking that can quickly and unexpectedly transform into a twister..blowing away structured systems.

11.	A company picknit – an outdoor area with numerous tables where like-minded employees take their 15 minute break to smoke off trivial complaints about their managers and coworkers..boosting their gossip production metric stats.

12.	The public library – The House of Stories.

13.	Needing a hand-out – after waking up from a nap to discover all of your puppies sitting on your arm, hand and stomach when attempting to sit up.

14.	A home sick Texan = when clicking both spurs together (several times) repeating the phrase: “There’s no place like Texas, there’s no place like Texas, there’s no place like..."

em

p.s. only this Eggster's July list 2017 (2) is for sale in this etsy posting.  The beach display will be posted separately in another listing.  Thx.

Support Operation Smile

Note: Please use MEMO, an editor writing software, in oder to open this digital file.

results.title: Eggster's Definitions August 2017
results.description:
Eggster's Definitions - August 2017


1.  Hack-No! Antivirus Software

2.  Domestic Silence - equivalent to physical violence with the exception...no visible scars.

3.  Paying Attention - Escort Services

4.  The Aisle Less Travelled - a thrift store warehouse (row of bins) filled with books and magazines.

5.  The Take It & Run with It Patent Pending Office

6.  Today's Sunday Church sermon: “Let's Shove It Down Your Throat" an excerpt from Sister Merry Eggster's book titled: “Got Guilt?”

7.  (Twit/Twat) - (Tomato/Tomatto) - (Potato/Pottato): Life is but an interpretation...with semantics.

8.  Racism/Prejudices = those who live life without a coloring book.

9.  The truth shall set you isolated...as well as free.

10.  No matter how odd/crazy this sounds:
        a.  Please...Don't follow me, I'm not a leader.
        b.  I don't want to walk with anyone else on earth.
        c.  I am only focusing on Hemming my own way back to God’s good grace.

Esther Monsalve

results.title: LIve Laugh Weed - Funny Subversive Cross Stitch Pattern - Instant Download
results.description:
Live Laugh Weed. 

Simple. Fun. Weed!

Modern cross stitch pattern is designed on 14 count Aida. It is 120 x 150 stitches,  will run a little shy of 9 x 11 inches.

This pattern will come with 2 different sized full colour patterns, for printing or viewing convenience, and a handy little tips and tricks printout to help you in your quest for cross stitching awesomeness. 

THIS IS NOT A PHYSICAL PATTERN. THIS LISTING IS FOR A PDF FILE. It includes a computer rendering of the finished pattern, a full color pattern, and a key in DMC thread colors. It will be automatically available for download after purchase. The link to download is sent to the email Etsy has on file for you.

If you ask me nicely, I can make changes to this pattern for you and crate a custom listing, but really, you can just mess around with the colours when you are stitching, it would work just as well. 

Please don’t resell my patterns or stitch them for profit, I worked really hard on them. Well actually, I used my laptop on my couch while drinking wine and watching Game of Thrones, but you know what I mean.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Decorative Quote Books, Fashion Designer Book Set, Books for Decoration, Coffee Table Books, Bookshelf Decor
results.description:
Live Love Laugh Decorative Quote Books, Fashion Designer Book Set, Books for Decoration, Coffee Table Books, Bookshelf Decor

Live Love Laugh....what could be more important? These bold black and white decorative books serve as a healthy daily reminder to enjoy life and all it has to offer. Three NEW hardcover books are given new designer clothes with the application of custom book covers featuring an eye-catching black and white color scheme. You can select whether you'd like the background in black and the text in white (as shown in the photos) or to have the reverse color scheme -- white background black text. The books are sure to make a statement on your bookshelf or coffee table. Pair them with some of my other black and white-themed books to make your own library. The placement of the title on these books allows them to be situated vertically or horizontally, whichever way you prefer.

The details:

📖  NUMBER OF BOOKS:  3, as shown

📖  BOOK DETAILS:  Unless specified otherwise, these sets are made with NEW generic hardcover novels (both fiction and non-fiction) that are selected randomly based on size. The books are generic in nature and do not relate the quote, topic, or any particular theme. Once they’re newly attired, they’re meant to be beautiful bookshelf art! 💕

Now offering 3 sizes of new blank books/journals! These blank books provide a perfect opportunity to use your set as journals, wedding guest books, photo albums, recipe catalogs, etc.....tons of options! You can easily upgrade to blank books/journals in the drop-down menu.

These sets can also be made with larger-format books (either a mix of generic coffee-table-size books), or with larger blank books/journals. If interested, please contact me for details.

📖  BOOK DIMENSIONS:  New generic hardcover books = approx. 9.25” wide x 6.25” deep x 1-1.7” spines

New standard-size blank books/journals = 9.25” wide x 7” deep x 1.3” spines  (If looking for a larger-size journal, or a pyramid-shaped stack, please contact me prior to placing an order.)

* Dimensions of books are approximate; sizes may vary slightly.

📖  COLORS: Your choice! Please see photos for all standard color combinations. 

📖  PRODUCTION SPECIFICS:  Most of my custom books have specialty covers that feature a soft-touch lamination finish for beauty and durability (similar to the book jacket finish of high-end book publishers). The interior flaps of the covers are attached so the covers fit securely. 

The fabric covered books are covered entirely in fabric (permanent finish). 

📖  PRODUCTION TIME: Standard orders typically take 1-2 weeks production time.

📖  SHIPPING: All books ship via USPS Media Mail, which can take anywhere from 5-15 business days. Please contact me if you have a specific need-by date to receive an expedited shipping quote. 

📖  CUSTOM ORDERS:  Looking for a different color combination or text? I’m happy to accommodate special requests! Please contact me prior to purchase to receive a proposal. 

This book set coordinates well with some of my other custom designs, such as:

www.etsy.com/listing/465065147

www.etsy.com/listing/713847180

www.etsy.com/listing/719481644

www.etsy.com/listing/714370776

www.etsy.com/listing/477091673

www.etsy.com/listing/524335414

📚  Thanks for looking and allowing me to combine two of my interests – a love of reading and an appreciation for beautiful design!  📚

PS. Please sign-up for our mailing list to receive special offers and tips for decorating your home:  https://www.subscribepage.com/d6b7o7
 
Follow us on social media. And don’t forget to tag us in your photos! We love to see how you display your books. 😊

results.title: Be Kind Stencil and Live Laugh Love stencil. Reusable Stencils for Wood Signs, Canvas & More. 2 pc Stencil Set
results.description:
🎨 GREAT VARIETY OF HOME DECOR STENCILS: Decorate your home with a variety of beautifully designed stencils. Each stencil measures 14.75 x 6 inches

🎨 DURABLE, FLEXIBLE AND REUSABLE: These stencils are made of premium quality laser cut 10 mil plastic with the ideal flexibility for painting on multiple flat surfaces including walls, wood, glass, fabric, canvas and furniture.

🎨 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We are a family-owned business dedicated to customer satisfaction. Crafting and stencils are our passion and if for any reason you are not satisfied with our high-quality stencils, we promise you a refund

Keys facts about our stencils:
✎Durable, flexible, and reusable
✎Laser-cut design with 10 mil (.25) thickness – #1 rated thickness for stencil painting on wood, canvas, and more
✎All stencils are made of eco-friendly food-safe PET plastic

📣Please note, stencil sizing is based on the PHYSICAL stencil, not text or image. Image/Text will be smaller than the listed size as we allow for a border to provide an area for masking off. If you have specific sizing questions, please don't hesitate to ask. 📣

results.title: Layered Heart Sterling Silver Pendant Necklace ~ CB&CO ~ CBandCO
results.description:
This 1'' sterling disc is layered under a heart that reads ''live laugh love''. The piece is textured to create interest, hangs from an 18'' sterling silver chain, and has an aged patina which has been applied by hand.

Please allow 3-5 days for the piece to be created and shipped.  

The chain is also available in 20" and 24" length.

All of my pieces are lovingly created entirely by me, one at a time, in my MN studio.
